vulnerabilities: Information exposure through an error message
description: The function 'unique_name_492' is vulnerable as it uses hard-coded credentials (client_id and client_secret) which can lead to unauthorized access if the code is exposed or leaked. This is related to CWE-798. Additionally, the function may expose sensitive information through error messages (if any error occurs during the execution), which is related to CWE-200. It's recommended to store sensitive data in secure storage and handle errors properly without revealing sensitive information.
